data.event: The Dallas Primary School was built in 1963.
Dallas Post Office opened on 21 February 1966, but from 1968 to 1995 was known as Broadmeadows before reverting to Dallas.

event.title: 1924 the Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works built

data.event: In 1924 the Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works built a reservoir for reticulating water for the Broadmeadows area.
The ABS reported in the 2001 Census that 28% of Dallas's residents originate from Turkey.
